nodes.text: This T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid, which was active during the Clone Wars, was present on the surface of the planet Anaxes during the Battle of Anaxes. It arrived at the aftermath of a short firefight between Clone Force 99 and a group of B1-series battle droids, holding a hologram of Admiral Trench. A nearby BX-series droid commando addressed the hologram, reporting that the clones had used unorthodox methods to defeat the droids. After the report, the tactical droid returned to the speeder in which it arrived and left the scene.

During the year 19 BBY, this tactical droid served under Admiral Trench during the Battle of Anaxes in the Clone Wars. He arrived at a crash site of a Republic Gunship on a speeder after a brief skirmish between Clone Force 99 and a squad of B1-series battle droids. A BX-series droid commando approached him as the tactical droid projected an image of Admiral Trench. The commando addresed the hologram, reporting that the clones had used unorthodox strategies to defeat the droids. Later on, the tactical droid reported to Trench from an ambushed Separatist Outpost, informing the Admiral that he was unable to think of the logic of the attack that had occurred. The tactical droid later reported to Trench after the clones were chased out of the Cyber Center that they had made a connection with the planet Skako Minor while there, which alarmed Trench.
